headline: Social interaction meets privacy.
signup_section_username: Choose an username. Sunglasses does not require an email, a real name or a profile picture to get you started, you just have to choose an username.
signup_section_password: Choose a password to access Sunglasses.
signup_section_recovery: Choose a recovery method. This will be the method used to recover your password in case you forget it.
signup_section_privacy: You have been successfully signed up. Now it is time to setup your privacy. Sunglasses cares a lot about your privacy, because of that by default you are completely private. You can choose between some predefined privacy settings now or setup your privacy settings yourself later.
signup_section_done: You have been successfully signed up at Sunglasses!
signup_username_error: Invalid username or taken. Usernames can only contain letters, numbers or underscores and must be between 2 and 30 characters long.
signup_password_error: Invalid password. Passwords must be at least 6 characters long.
signup_recovery_question_error: The recovery question can not be blank.
signup_recovery_answer_error: The recovery answer can not be blank.
signup_recovery_email_info: We will not store your email as plain text, we will store a hash.
login_username_error: Usernames can only contain letters, numbers or underscores and must be between 2 and 30 characters long.
no_posts_message: Follow some users and posts things!
enter_video_url: Enter an URL from Youtube or Vimeo...
error_post_invalid_url: The submitted URL is not valid!
error_post_text_empty: Post text can not be empty!
error_post_text_too_long: Status text must not be more than 1500 characters long!
error_post_invalid_video_url: The URL is not a valid vimeo or youtube url!
error_code_12: You are not authorized to access this resource
error_code_16: You can't access this resource being logged in
error_code_21: You can't send a follow request to that user
error_code_22: The follow request does not exist
error_code_25: Neither the recovery question nor the recovery answer can be blank
error_code_28: Password must be at least 6 characters long
error_code_32: One or more of the provided websites is not a valid url
error_code_33: One or more of the provided fields is more than 500 characters long
error_code_50: Status text must not be more than 1500 characters long
error_code_51: Caption must not be more than 255 characters long
error_code_52: The maximum file size allowed is 10MB
error_code_60: Comment text must not be more than 500 characters long or be empty
